alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued December 08 at 9:19AM PST until December 10 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 20 to 25 feet. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast, mainly from Cape Blanco southward, but especially south-facing beaches and ports. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong storm force winds will cause extremely large breaking waves and dangerous conditions, especially along beaches and area shorelines. Waves will inundate beaches and surge into normally dry areas. Infrastructure damage and significant beach erosion can be expected. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Beaches and coastlines will become extremely hazardous due to very large and life-threatening surf conditions. Stay off of beaches, rocks, jetties, piers, and other waterside infrastructure.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
